metadata.title: CVE-2013-7258 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in web2ldap 1.1.x before 1.1.49allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viaunspecified vectors related to "displaying group DN and entry data in groupadministration UI."

criterions.comment: web2ldap package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
